instruction: Summarize the story of the movie “The Shawshank Redemption”.
output: The Shawshank Redemption is a 1994 film about the prison life of Andy Dufresne, played by Tim Robbins. After being convicted of a double murder he long maintained he did not commit, Andy is sentenced to life in prison where he befriends fellow inmate Red, played by Morgan Freeman. After nearly two decades of wrongfully serving his sentence, he takes measures to break out of prison and start his life afresh.
